Reviews.Title: great bundle
Reviews.Author: cevillegas
Reviews.Content: This purchase is perfect for a beginning or amateur photographer and includes everything who is ready to start the digital world of photography. I'm a college student who is just starting a major in photography and this is going to be perfect for a starter camera. The Sony camera is very light weight and perfect for on the go life styles.

ProductInfo.Features:
Tasca 30 Camera Pouch by Lowepro (Color May Vary)
Spare NP-BX1 Battery
LexSpeed 32GB SDHC Class 10 Memory Card
Flexpod Flexible Tripod
Giotto's Air Blower + Nikon Lens Pen Cleaning System
ProductInfo.Name: Sony DSC-HX50V/B DSCHX50/B DSCHX50V/B DSCHX50VB + LoewPro Case + Battery + Flexpod + 32GB (10) Deluxe Bundle
